articles.description: Reaction as Aston Villa lose to Olympiakos in the Europa Conference League semi-finals and Bayer Leverkusen set new European unbeaten record, plus Premier League news conferences.
articles.title: Reaction: Aston Villa lose & Leverkusen set unbeaten record

articles.description: Former US Open champion Dominic Thiem says he will retire later this year because of the wrist injury which derailed his career.
articles.title: Dominic Thiem to retire this year because of wrist injury

articles.description: Manchester City's first penalty against Wolves should not have been given, an independent panel says
articles.title: Manchester City should not have had first penalty versus Wolves - panel

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says there is "no strain" in his relationship with Tiger Woods but admits they do not "see eye-to-eye" on the sport's future.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy denies fall-out with Tiger Woods over future of golf

articles.description: Donovan Mitchell stars as the Cleveland Cavaliers level their Eastern Conference semi-final series against the top-seeded Boston Celtics.
articles.title: NBA: Donovan Mitchell stars as Cleveland Cavaliers level tie against Boston Celtics

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Kasabian frontman and Leicester fan Serge Pizzorno to make predictions for this weekend's Premier League games.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v Kasabian frontman Serge Pizzorno

articles.description: Listen to BBC local radio commentaries and follow live text coverage from day one of the County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Day one - radio & text

articles.description: Nelly Korda is six shots off the lead at the Cognizant Founders Cup as she aims to win a record-breaking sixth straight LPGA Tour title.
articles.title: Nelly Korda six shots behind Rose Zhang in Cognizant Founders Cup

articles.description: Former Arsenal midfielder Cesc Fabregas looks ahead to the Gunners' crucial game against Manchester United on Sunday, on the Planet Premier League podcast.
articles.title: Manchester United v Arsenal: Cesc Fabregas looks ahead to Premier League game

articles.description: Andy Murray will begin his comeback from an ankle injury at an ATP Challenger event in Bordeaux next week.
articles.title: Andy Murray to make injury comeback in Bordeaux
